scene_description_enriched: The upper register depicts a figure, likely God, with a halo and a golden robe, holding a disc divided into four quadrants in his left hand and raising his right hand in a gesture of blessing or creation. He is set against a blue, star-filled sky with swirling clouds. Below, a young man with a crown is depicted within the mouth of a large, dark blue sea creature, surrounded by green, wavy water. The scene is framed by an ornamental border.
